testcase.name: Register new user name
testcase.system-out: Given I should be able to enter all details for the Login page..............passed When I click on the sign up button..........................................passed When I enter the firstname as "Sowmya"......................................passed And I enter the lastname as "Prasad"........................................passed And I enter the e-mail as "sowmyap190@gmail.com"............................passed And I enter the username as "sowmyap190"....................................passed And I enter the password as "sowmyap190"....................................passed And I enter the confirmpassword as "sowmyap190".............................passed And I click on the registration button......................................passed And I click on the picture button...........................................passed And I click on the inbox button.............................................passed And I click on the compose button...........................................passed And I click on sendto as "sowmyap1234@gmail.com"............................passed And I enter the subject as "Hi For Testing".................................passed And I click on the Send Message button......................................passed Then I should see the acknowledgement window as "The message has been sent to Sowmya Prasad (sowmyap1234)".passed
